amendment.description: An amendment numbered 113 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce the salary of Michael Regan, Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A063) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 265 (Roll no. 590).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A063) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 265 (Roll no. 590).
